question: In Kanazawa City, Japan, what is the name of the museum dedicated to contemporary art, which opened in 2004?
true_answer: 21st Century Museum of Contemporary Art, Kanazawa
asked_question_translated: Hvad hedder det museum i Kanazawa City i Japan, der er dedikeret til samtidskunst, og som åbnede i 2004?
answer: Museet i Kanazawa City, der er dedikeret til samtidskunst og åbnede i 2004, hedder 21st Century Museum of Contemporary Art.
answer_translated_eng: Dedicated to contemporary art, the museum in Kanazawa City opened in 2004 and is called the 21st Century Museum of Contemporary Art.
